short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flowtide is a beautiful new tab page for your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_US,es_4:
Flowtide is a heavily customizable, beautiful, and modular New Tab page. Flowtide lets you build your New Tab page, customizing it every step of the way, using a simple drag-and-drop widget system. Get stuff done with todos, stay focused with Pomodoro, relax with soundscapes, and move faster with Magic Search. All of these can be added with the + icon in Widgets mode.

Magic Search lets you easily search through your bookmarks, create content across platforms, and compute math, all by pressing Ctrl+K or '/'. 

Features:
- Widget-based system for max customizability
- Use it as a speed dial or a nightstand-style clock
- Listen to relaxing soundscapes
- Focus with the pomodoro technique
- Beautiful background images, solid colors, gradients, all up to you
- Change the font, layout, theme, and more
- Be greeted on every New Tab

Flowtide is open-source software. You can view the source code at https://github.com/thingbomb/flowtide. Contributions are much appreciated.
long.en_AU,en_GB,es,fr:
Flowtide is a heavily customizable, beautiful, and modular New Tab page. Flowtide lets you build your New Tab page, customizing it every step of the way, using a simple drag-and-drop widget system. Get stuff done with todos and the pomodoro technique, relax with soundscapes, and move faster with Magic Search.

Magic Search lets you easily search through your bookmarks, create content across platforms, and compute math, all by pressing Ctrl+K or '/'. 

Features:
- Widget-based system for max customizability
- Use it as a speed dial or a nightstand-style clock
- Listen to relaxing soundscapes
- Focus with the pomodoro technique
- Beautiful background images, solid colors, gradients, all up to you
- Change the font, layout, theme, and more
- Be greeted on every New Tab

Flowtide is 100% free and open-source software. You can view the source code at https://github.com/thingbomb/flowtide. Contributions are much appreciated.
